data.Actor: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Trey Parker
data.Title: Despicable Me 3
data.Description: Gru and his wife Lucy must stop former '80s child star Balthazar Bratt from achieving world domination.

data.Actor: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Benjamin Bratt
data.Title: Despicable Me 2
data.Description: Gru is recruited by the Anti-Villain League to help deal with a powerful new super criminal.

data.Actor: Steve Carell, Miranda Cosgrove, Dana Gaier
data.Title: Despicable Me
data.Description: Villainous Gru lives up to his reputation as a despicable, deplorable and downright unlikable guy when he hatches a plan to steal the moon from the sky. But he has a tough time staying on task after three orphans land in his care.

data.Actor: Miranda Cosgrove, Dana Gaier, Elsie Fisher
data.Title: Despicable Me Presents: Minion Madness
data.Description: Three new mini-movies from the creators of Despicable Me. Orientation Day: Three freshly cloned minions go through the wacky orientation process at the evil laboratories of Gru. Home Makeover: The minions "assist" Edith, Margo & Agnes in a home makeover when they find out a social worker is going to pay them a visit. Watch the crazy antics ensue! Banana: A minion finds a banana in his lunch bag. To what lengths will the other minions go through to steal away that coveted yellow goodness?

data.Actor: Ari McCarthy, Hamish Phillips, Kit Erhart-Bruce
data.Title: Talk to Me
data.Description: When a group of friends discover how to conjure spirits using an embalmed hand, they become hooked on the new thrill, until one of them goes too far and unleashes terrifying supernatural forces.

data.Actor: Ari McCarthy, Hamish Phillips, Kit Erhart-Bruce
data.Title: Talk to Me
data.Description: A prequel short film that tells the story of Duckett entirely through cell phones and social media.

data.Actor: Lee Marshall, Lauren Beatty, Aris Tyros
data.Title: Bleed with Me
data.Description: During a winter getaway at an isolated cabin, a self-destructive young woman becomes convinced that her best friend is stealing her blood.

data.Actor: Morgan Kohan, Sebastian Pigott, Drew Nelson
data.Title: Demons Inside Me
data.Description: While attending a housewarming party in Costa Rica, Jade Williams is victim of a psychotic episode. But Jade's delusional jealousy disorder may have nothing to do with it. Don't build a mansion on sacred ground, some landowners had said.

data.Actor: Lauren Cohan, Kyra Sedgwick, Thomas Jane
data.Title: Reach Me
data.Description: Each member of a group of people has a connection to a self-help book authored by a reclusive former football coach.

data.Actor: Bruce Dern, Brian Cox, Caroline Silhol
data.Title: Remember Me
data.Description: After discovering his old flame now has Alzheimer's, a hopelessly in love widower fakes his way into her senior living community in an effort to reunite with her.

data.Actor: , Laura Benson, Christian Bayerlein
data.Title: Touch Me Not
data.Description: Together, a filmmaker and her characters venture into a personal research project about intimacy. On the fluid border between reality and fiction, Touch Me Not follows the emotional journeys of Laura, Tómas and Christian, offering a deeply empathic insight into their lives. Craving for intimacy yet also deeply afraid of it, they work to overcome old patterns, defense mechanisms and taboos, to cut the cord and finally be free.  Touch Me Not looks at how we can find intimacy in the most unexpected ways, at how to love another without losing ourselves.

data.Actor: Jim Sturgess, Andreja Pejic, Antonia Campbell-Hughes
data.Title: The Other Me
data.Description: The life of a young architect is thrown into turmoil when he's diagnosed with a rare eye disease. As his condition worsens, he questions his life and career choices, and his relationship to his frustrated wife becomes more strained.

data.Actor: Aubrey Plaza, Alison Brie, Debby Ryan
data.Title: Spin Me Round
data.Description: When the manager of an Italian restaurant chain wins the opportunity to attend the franchise’s educational immersion program in Italy, what she thought would be a romantic getaway devolves into chaos and catastrophe.

data.Actor: Kasumi Arimura, Lily Franky, Jun Fubuki
data.Title: Call Me Chihiro
data.Description: An unapologetic former sex worker starts working at a bento stand in a small seaside town, bringing comfort to the lonely souls who come her way.

data.Actor: Arak Amornsupasiri, Sirat Intarachote, Nat Kitcharit
data.Title: 4 Kings
data.Description: Inspired by the real story of the conflict between the student from four different technician colleges in the 90s, where violence can be used to build friendships and enemies at the same time.

data.Actor: Arak Amornsupasiri, Sirat Intarachote, Nat Kitcharit
data.Title: 4 Kings
data.Description: After a drug dealer schemes against them in secret, two student gangs ignite a bitter feud that triggers a chain of violent consequences.

data.Actor: Jeanie Gold, Eleanor Burke, Penelope Read
data.Title: Remember Me
data.Description: Rose awakes in an unknown house following a serious car accident with memory loss and no ability to walk. Her Mother and boyfriend are there to help her. Rose wants to piece together her life before the accident. All is not what it seems.

data.Actor: Benedict Cumberbatch, ,
data.Title: Walk With Me
data.Description: Narrated by Benedict Cumberbatch, Walk With Me is a cinematic journey into the world of a monastic community who practice the art of mindfulness with Zen Buddhist master Thich Nhat Hanh.

data.Actor: Cindy Blackman, Jess Bowen, Clem Burke
data.Title: Count Me In
data.Description: An exhilarating celebration of the art of rock drumming, featuring some of the best drummers ever to have graced the drumkit. The viewer is taken on a uplifting journey through some of the most iconic music ever created, focusing on the women and men with the sticks, their passions, culture and awe-inspiring energy.

data.Actor: Alfie Stewart, Frazer Alexander, Jennie Eggleton
data.Title: Tear Me Apart
data.Description: In the wastelands of post-apocalyptic England, two young brothers turn to cannibalism to survive, only to fall for their prey, a teenage girl... and possibly the last female left alive.

data.Actor: Kodi Smit-McPhee, , Richard Jenkins
data.Title: Let Me In
data.Description: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.  A remake of the movie “Let The Right One In” which was an adaptation of a book.

data.Actor: Sameena Jabeen Ahmed, Connor McCarron, Gary Lewis
data.Title: Catch Me Daddy
data.Description: Laila, a girl on the run from her family is hiding out in West Yorkshire with her drifter boyfriend Aaron. When her brother arrives in town with a gang of thugs in tow, she is forced to flee for her life and faces her darkest night.

data.Actor: Neal Ward, Christopher Mulvin, Hannah Al Rashid
data.Title: Feed Me
data.Description: Following the death of his wife, a broken man spirals into an abyss of night tremors and depression and finds himself in the home of a deranged cannibal who convinces him to take his own life in the most horrific way imaginable.

data.Actor: Anne Heche, Dermot Mulroney, McKaley Miller
data.Title: You're Killing Me
data.Description: Eden goes to a coveted 'Heaven and Hell' party, hoping to get a letter of recommendation to an elite university from the wealthy parents of her classmate, but the party quickly turns into a fight for her life.

data.Actor: Dominique Swain, Arie Thompson, Eric St John
data.Title: 4 Horsemen: Apocalypse
data.Description: A small team of scientists must race against time to stop what seems to be a cascade of global disasters signaling the possible apocalypse and end of days.

data.Actor: Kevin Hart, Mark Wahlberg, Regina Hall
data.Title: Me Time
data.Description: With his family away, a devoted stay-at-home dad enjoys his first me time in years by joining his hard-partying old friend on a wild birthday adventure.

data.Actor: Jennifer Ansari, Lester Bailey Jr, Towanda Braxton
data.Title: Stick Me Up
data.Description: Held hostage in a diner, ten very different people, learn they have more in common than it appears.

data.Actor: Jennifer Lopez, Owen Wilson, Maluma
data.Title: Marry Me
data.Description: Pop superstar Kat Valdez is about to get married before an audience of her loyal fans. However, seconds before the ceremony, she learns about her fiance's cheating ways and has a meltdown on stage. In a moment of inspired insanity, Kat locks eyes with a total stranger in the crowd and marries him on the spot. As forces conspire to separate the unlikely newlyweds, they must soon decide if two people from such different worlds can find true love together.

data.Title: Lead Me Home
data.Description: Poignant stories of homelessness on the West Coast of the US frame this cinematic portrait of a surging humanitarian crisis.

data.Actor: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci
data.Title: Lethal Weapon 4
data.Description: Officers Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh of the Los Angeles Police Department must stop a dangerous crime lord from China from getting his brother out of jail.

data.Actor: Britt Robertson, Molly Hagan, Andy Buckley
data.Title: Ask Me Anything
data.Description: Beautiful, wild, funny, and lost, Katie Kampenfelt takes a year off before college to find herself, all the while chronicling her adventures in an anonymous blog into which she pours her innermost secrets. Eventually, Katie's fearless narrative begins to crack, and dark pieces of her past emerge.

data.Actor: Gary Clarke, Steve Ihnat, Jeannine Riley
data.Title: Strike Me Deadly
data.Description: A forest ranger witnesses a murder. He and his wife are captured by the killer and held captive in a remote cabin.

data.Actor: Abimana Aryasatya, Putri Marino, Lutesha
data.Title: The Big 4
data.Description: A by-the-book female detective teams up with four down-on-their-luck assassins to investigate her father's murder.

data.Actor: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Annie Potts
data.Title: Toy Story 4
data.Description: Woody has always been confident about his place in the world and that his priority is taking care of his kid, whether that's Andy or Bonnie. But when Bonnie adds a reluctant new toy called "Forky" to her room, a road trip adventure alongside old and new friends will show Woody how big the world can be for a toy.
